header.title: Blauweiss Operations Portal
header.subtitle: Central control for applications, CRM, billing & infrastructure

crawler.title: Applications Crawler
crawler.description: Crawls freelancermap.de for new projects. Keywords: DevOps, Python, AI, Kubernetes.

matcher.title: Applications Matcher
matcher.description: Matches crawled projects against profiles (Wolfram, Ian, Michael, Team).

drafts.title: Gmail Drafter
drafts.description: Creates Gmail drafts for top matches with personalized cover letters.

fullPipeline.title: Full Pipeline
fullPipeline.description: Complete pipeline: Crawl → Match → QA → Drafts. Daily Mon-Fri 08:00.

board.title: CRM Board
board.description: Kanban board with 185 issues. 8 status columns from New to Accepted.

integrity.title: CRM Integrity Check
integrity.description: Checks label consistency, ghost detection, funnel health. Weekly Mon 07:00.

timesheet.title: Timesheet Generator
timesheet.description: Generates timesheets from calendar events. Monthly on the 1st at 06:00.

invoice.title: Invoice Generation
invoice.description: Generate PDF invoices from timesheets and send via email.

linux.title: Linux Runner (Yoga)
linux.description: Docker + Shell Runner on Linux Yoga. Primary CI/CD Runner.

mac.title: Mac Runner (Mac2)
mac.description: Docker + Shell Runner on Mac Mini M2. Fallback Runner.

gcp.title: GCP VM
gcp.description: Google Cloud VM for benchmarks and heavy workloads.

manual.title: User Manual
manual.description: Step-by-step guide for all portal functions.
